actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities

official_title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2003.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2003 (Public Law 108-7, div. F) to repeal a limitation on the portion of National Endowment for the Arts grant funds which may be made available to any single State.

titles.title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2003.
To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2003.
